You can try it since it's just your feet you should be fine since they tell you not to take hot baths or be in hot tubs because it will raise your body temp too high if it's just your feet I don't see the issue.. Have you been checked for preclampsia? As long as its just your feet, yes!

The hot soak shouldn't effect the baby in any kind of way as long as your body temp doesn't go over 103° farenhit for a long time baby is just fine :)

If the swelling is out of no where and severe then you should mention to your doctor , because it could be a sign of preeclampsia, especially if it is with swollen hands , headache, or vision changes. But if you've had swollen feet for a while then it probobly just from being pregnant lol
They test pre eclampsia by blood pressure and urine sample to check protein. It's basically just high blood pressure
